original_text: You may work for six days each week, but on the seventh day you must rest. That is true even when it is the time to plough your fields. It is also true at harvest time. You must rest on the seventh day each week.
korean_text: 너는 엿새 동안 일하고 일곱째 날에는 쉴지니 밭 갈 때에나 거둘 때에도 쉴지며

sentences.original_text: You may work for six days each week
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 매주 6일 동안 일할 수 있지만

sentences.original_text: but on the seventh day you must rest

sentences.korean_translation: 너는 매주 일곱째 날에 쉬어야 한다
